tool_description: REST APIs to retrieve company data, ultimate beneficial owner data, and more.
name: CompanyScout
title: CompanyScout

api_list.name: /v1/companies

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search string. A fulltext input, searching across all relevant fields.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Filter by status. Only companies with the given status will be returned. Possible values are: active, inactive.

optional_parameters.name: incorporation_country
optional_parameters.description: Country code to filter by. Only companies incorporated in the given country will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: nace_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter by primary industry NACE code. Only companies within the given industry will be returned.

api_list.name: /v1/people/{id}
/v1/companies/{countryCode}/{registrationNumber}
api_list.description:
Retrieves a company by its registration number.
The registration number is a unique identifier for the company in the data source registry.

required_parameters.name: registrationNumber
required_parameters.description: Official registration number of the company.
